discussions.title: The ending still gives me chills!
discussions.content: Just rewatched Endgame and that final battle scene is absolutely epic. What's your favorite moment?

discussions.title: Joaquin Phoenix's performance was incredible
discussions.content: The way he portrayed Arthur's transformation was haunting. Definitely deserved that Oscar!

discussions.title: Can't wait for Part Two!
discussions.content: The visuals and soundtrack were absolutely stunning. Denis Villeneuve is a master filmmaker.

discussions.title: Best Spider-Man movie ever!
discussions.content: Seeing all three Spider-Men together was a dream come true. The multiverse concept was executed perfectly!

discussions.title: Nolan's masterpiece
discussions.content: The layers of dreams within dreams still blow my mind. This movie gets better with every rewatch.
